dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
http://turcojumbo-150112.blogspot.com/

We have found out that, There have been alleged copyright infringement material on the content  that are both complying with the
Digital Millennnium Copyright Act (http://www.copyright.gov) and international copyright infringement regulations. )

Aforesaid web sites has been publishing decoded tv broadcast of ours - (copyrighted by our company ) to the public free.
All of the legal broadcast rights belong to our channel http://www.ligtv.com.tr These broadcast is based on subscription paid system and they are also encrypted, when only can be watched by our subscribers.

These broadcast is open to public via your web site These are the copyrights of broadcasts of Turkish Super Football League matches, which last 90 minutes, and they are broadcasted live.
Our company has been paying 2 million USD to the Football Clubs and Federation in Turkiye for its legal publishing rights..
This issue is too important. Otherwise, you will face with a very enourmous sum of compensation pay legally. These publishing/broadcast should be terminated according to DMCA.

Our team will determine any infringing action of right away and will notify you on this during the live broadcast hours.
As the matches are performed during the weekends and have a 90-minute-duration, it will be quiet difficult from your end to interrupt those illegal actions at the right now.
We think, the best thing to do is either you give us an authorization (e.g by providing a take-down tool)  to prevent those illegal broadcasting or the minute we notify you on this right away, you should be closing those address at the right minute.

No need to remind that, we can prevent these publications by pursuing the site containing the infringing material , if we put a legal file on this case by our attorneys to the local Turkish authorities. But this time, all access to your site within the country will be blocked by the court in Turkey, which we believe that all of your members will be totally affected by this issue.
Waiting for your collaboration on this issue.
--------------------------Accuracy Statement---------------------------
We hereby state  that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury,
that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Digital Platform IletiÅŸim Hizmetleri A.S. (DIGITURK)
Cihannuma Mah. Polat Tower No : [redacted] / Istanbul TURKEY


[redacted]
#MCP, MCSA, MCSE

DIGITURK Anti Fraud Team
____________________________
[redacted]@digiturk.com.tr
Digital Platform iletisim Hiz.A.S.
Polat Tower No : 34 Beskitas / istanbul

Bu nedenle bu bilgilerin ne sekilde olursa olsun iceriginden, iletilmesinden, alinmasindan ve saklanmasindan sorumlu degildir.
